Package com.redis.ds.ds_redis.core

Class RedisCore

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_redis.core.RedisCore
public class RedisCore extends Object
The RedisCore class is responsible for accessing the core Redis commands via the Jedis programmatic library. It designed to simplify the use of core Foundation class objects like items, documents and grids. You can instantiate this class from the parent RedisDS class.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • OSS Redis Commands
  • Jedis GitHub site
  • Intro to Jedis â€“ the Java Redis Client Library

  • Method Details

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Determines if a key already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      true if it exists and false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • expire

      public void expire(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Expires the key/value based on the default configuration value specified.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Name of key
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • set

      public void set(String aKeyName, String aValue, int aTimeoutSeconds) throws RedisDSException
      Sets a key and its string value in the Redis database. Optionally, if the timeout parameter is non-zero, then its expiration time will be assigned. If global value encryption is enabled, then the string value will be encrypted before it is written to the database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      aValue - String value
      aTimeoutSeconds - Timeout in seconds (zero will bypass any expiration)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • set

      public void set(String aKeyName, String aValue) throws RedisDSException
      Sets a key and its string value in the Redis database. If global value encryption is enabled, then the string value will be encrypted before it is written to the database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      aValue - String value
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • get

      public String get(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Retrieves the string value for the key name.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      String value
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • sortedSetAdd

      public void sortedSetAdd(String aKeyName, long aScore, String aValue) throws RedisDSException
      Adds a score and value to a sorted set in the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      aScore - Numeric score
      aValue - Set value
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source error

    • sortedSetIncrementBy

      public void sortedSetIncrementBy(String aKeyName, long anAmount, String aValue) throws RedisDSException

      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      anAmount - Increment amount
      aValue - Set value
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source error

    • sortedSetCount

      public long sortedSetCount(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Returns the count of sorted set members in the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      Count of set members
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source error

    • sortedSetLoad

      public List<String> sortedSetLoad(String aKeyName, long anOffsetStart, long anOffsetEnd) throws RedisDSException
      Loads the list of sorted set values between the range parameters from the Redis database. Redis.GRID_RANGE_SCHEMA, Redis.GRID_RANGE_START, Redis.GRID_RANGE_FINISH
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      anOffsetStart - Starting offset
      anOffsetEnd - Ending offset
      Returns:
      List of set values
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source error

    • sortedSetDelete

      public boolean sortedSetDelete(String aKeyName, String aValue) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the sorted set member identify by the value parameter.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      aValue - Member value
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source error

    • createLock

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataItem createLock(String aKeyName)
      Create a lock item that can be used to acquire and release a resource lock in Redis.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      Lock item instance

    • createLock

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataItem createLock(String aKeyName, long aReleaseInMilliseconds, long aWaitForMilliseconds)
      Create a lock item that can be used to acquire and release a resource lock in Redis.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      aReleaseInMilliseconds - Amount of time to hold the lock (in milliseconds)
      aWaitForMilliseconds - Amount of time to wait for the lock to free up (in milliseconds)
      Returns:
      Lock item instance

    • acquireLock

      public boolean acquireLock(com.redis.foundation.data.DataItem aLockItem) throws RedisDSException
      Acquires a temporary lock for a key-based operation. You must call createLock() with the lock properties prior to invoking this method.
      Parameters:
      aLockItem - Lock item instance
      Returns:
      true if lock was successfully acquired and false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Resource Locking

    • delete

      public long delete(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the key and associated value synchronously from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      Count of successfully deleted key/value(s)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • delete

      public long delete(List<String> aKeyNameList) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the list of keys and associated values asynchronously from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyNameList - List of key names
      Returns:
      Count of successfully deleted key/value(s)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

      Parameters:
      aDataItem - Data item instance.
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

      Parameters:
      aLockItem - Lock item instance
      Throws:

    • memoryUsage

      public long memoryUsage(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Queries Redis for the memory usage (in bytes) of the value data structure identified by the key name.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name
      Returns:
      Memory usage in bytes
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • info

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc info() throws RedisDSException
      Executes an information request call on the Redis Server and populates a Data document with the details.
      Returns:
      Memory usage in bytes
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • info

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc info(String aSection) throws RedisDSException
      Executes an information request call on the Redis Server and populates a Data document with the details.
      Parameters:
      aSection - Defined in Redis class as REDIS_INFO_SECTION_xxxx
      Returns:
      Memory usage in bytes
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • createSchemaDoc

      Creates a data document with items suitable for a schema editor UI.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the schema
      Returns:
      Data document representing a schema

    • schemaDocToDataGrid

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid schemaDocToDataGrid(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc, boolean anIsExtended)
      Convert a data document schema definition into a data grid suitable for rendering in a schema editor UI.
      Parameters:
      aSchemaDoc - Data document instance (representing the schema)
      anIsExtended - If true, then non standard features will be recognized
      Returns:
      Data grid representing the schema definition
